      • withTransport

        public RaftServer.Builder withTransport(Transport transport)
        Description copied from class: Raft.Builder
        Sets the network transport.

        The provided Transport will be used to connect to provided Members to join the cluster at startup and participate in all aspects of the Raft consensus protocol.

        Specified by:
        withTransport in class Raft.Builder<RaftServer.Builder,RaftServer>
        Parameters:
        transport - The network protocol.
        Returns:
        The Raft builder.

      • build

        public RaftServer build()
        Description copied from class: Builder
        Builds the object.

        The returned object may be a new instance of the built class or a recycled instance, depending on the semantics of the builder implementation. Users should never assume that a builder allocates a new instance.

        Specified by:
        build in class Builder<RaftServer>
        Returns:
        The built object.
